texts.textentryhtml: From Mather, "Charles Herbert Moore...": [gift of] The artist's daughter, Elizabeth Huntington Moore. (See reference Bib. 2150);

Charles Herbert Moore (1840–1930; born Hartfield, England; died New York, NY), Pine Tree, 1868. Recto: Pen and black ink with touches of graphite
Verso: Graphite; 60.6 × 50.2 cm (sight), 88 × 75.4 × 2 cm (frame). Gift of Miss Elizabeth Huntington Moore, the artist's daughter (x1951-89)
